name: Power Cord
description:
This is the game we made for Mini-Jam 73 called Power Cord but unfortunately we ran into some issue at the end getting the game uploaded.

The player goal is to reach the outlet on each level while only having a limited number of moves. The player can collect upgrades to give them more moves and also is required to collect power before they can complete the level.

The player cant move back over any tile they have already moved on so they need to be careful in their movements. 

The player also need to avoid being hit by enemies otherwise they will need to restart the level. They can block the enemy though it they block it in with the cord.

Art & Music by: https://twitter.com/artisticcarcras?lang=en

Programmed By: https://twitter.com/BrockMorePixels

Sounds From:

https://freesound.org/people/harrietniamh/sounds/415079/ - Death Sound
https://freesound.org/people/bantha%20brain/sounds/44498/ - Movement Sound
https://freesound.org/people/elijahdanie/sounds/487436/ - Level Complete Sound
https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270304/ - Pickup Sound
